6.text:
-Notes displayed as QR codes can now be shared with other apps
-Added this dialog to keep you informed about changes and new features. You can view this changelog again in the 'about' section in the app settings!
-The order of all displayed notifications can reversed
-Minor improvements and bug fixes

5.text:
-Replaced 'fontawesome'-icons with material-design icon
-Added more icons to the options menu
-Notes can now be displayed as a QR Code
-Minor improvements and bug fixes
